title: Modern Lounge Chair
description: Elegant solid wood lounge chair with velvet upholstery. The frame is crafted from solid white oak with a natural finish that highlights the beautiful grain patterns. The seat and back cushions are filled with high-density foam and wrapped in premium velvet upholstery for exceptional comfort and durability.

title: Luxurious King Bed
description: Handcrafted king-size bed with premium upholstery and gold accents. The headboard features elegant channel tufting with premium velvet upholstery. The frame is constructed from kiln-dried hardwood for superior stability, while the solid wood legs include subtle gold cap details that enhance the luxurious feel.

title: Contemporary Coffee Table
description: Minimalist coffee table with tempered glass top and gold metal frame. The table features a 12mm thick tempered glass top with polished edges for safety and elegance. The geometric base is crafted from stainless steel with a brushed gold finish that resists fingerprints and scratches.

title: Designer Dining Set
description: Elegant 6-seater dining set with premium upholstered chairs and marble top table. The tabletop features genuine Italian Carrara marble with a sealed finish for durability and easy maintenance. The solid wood base provides stability and style, while the chairs are upholstered in premium performance fabric that resists stains and fading.
dimensions: Table: 72" x 42" x 30", Chairs: 19" x 24" x 38"

title: Velvet Accent Chair
description: Plush velvet accent chair with gold metal legs, perfect for adding a touch of luxury. The frame is constructed from engineered hardwood for strength and stability, while the seat cushion uses high-resiliency foam with feather blend wrap for exceptional comfort. The rich emerald green velvet upholstery is soft to the touch and creates a striking visual statement.

title: Designer Bookshelf
description: Contemporary open bookshelf with geometric design in gold and black finish. The frame is constructed from durable iron tubing with a brushed gold finish, while the shelves feature black tempered glass that provides both strength and elegance. The asymmetrical design allows for creative display of books and decorative objects.

title: Modern Recliner
description: Sleek modern recliner with full-grain leather upholstery and power controls. This contemporary recliner features a smooth power mechanism that allows you to find your perfect position with the touch of a button. The high-density foam cushioning provides exceptional support, while the full-grain leather upholstery adds luxury and durability.
